# Hyperscaler Cloud Platform Tender Announcement (ACAN)

## Overview

The Government of Canada intends to establish a contract for a Hyperscaler Cloud Platform, which will provide a cloud-based platform for the delivery of digital services.

## Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** 24-810
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Publication Date:** June 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 27, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date:** To be determined

## Solicitation Description

Export Development Canada (EDC) seeks to establish a contract with a Hyperscaler Cloud Provider to support the continued delivery of Microsoft Azure. This contract will leverage the existing infrastructure and ecosystem of configured services to avoid duplication of costs and inconvenience.

## Additional Information

* **Procurement Category:** Services
* **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Procurement Method:** Advance contract award notice
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa and National Capital Region (NCR)

## Notice Document

The tender notice document, including Amendment 1, is attached.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or to submit a statement of capabilities, please contact Corey Forman at [solicitations@edc.ca](mailto:solicitations@edc.ca) or (613) 598-2546.
